name: StilgarBF.github.com
body:
# StilgarBF.github.com

## about me

I am a freelance - webdeveloper with some years experience in PHP, HTML, CSS, JS.

Location: Europe > Germany > Bavaria > Frankonia

***

## projects / repositories

### HTML5-Boilerplate

[http://github.com/StilgarBF/html5-boilerplate](http://github.com/StilgarBF/html5-boilerplate)

A fork of the [HTML5-Boilerplate](http://html5boilerplate.com/) with some modifications and additions.
I'm doing a lot of design2html / slicing. This is my startingpoint for those jobs.

### JXBF

[http://github.com/StilgarBF/jxbf](http://github.com/StilgarBF/jxbf)

**JavaScript-XML-Browser-Framework** can be used for website backends. It's build with a focus on datamanagement-tasks like customer-data, productmanagement for onlineshops, etc.

***

## other sites

* [blog.projekt2k.de](http://blog.projekt2k.de) my blog
* [google+](https://plus.google.com/115164775790778410145) meet me an g+
